traceability.evidence: - src/config-loader.js implements loading, validation, and merging of .dry-aged-deps.json - src/cli-options.js wires loadConfigFile into option parsing with precedence CLI > config > defaults - test/cli.config-file.test.js covers all acceptance criteria: default values from config, CLI overrides, invalid JSON, unknown keys, invalid values, custom config-file flag, missing file error - README.md includes --config-file option and example .dry-aged-deps.json format
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria for config-file support are implemented, tested, and documented. The config file is optional, schema and value validation are in place, CLI flags override config values, and sensible defaults apply when neither flags nor config are provided.
